trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>evento ocorre quando um aspecto visual de um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs specifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to use to draw the panel, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> object in which to draw the panel, the panel identification number, state information about the panel, and the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto a ser usado para desenhar o painel, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>objeto no qual desenhar o painel, o número de identificação do painel, informações de estado sobre o painel e o painel para desenhar.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event to create custom-drawn panels in your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os dados fornecidos por essa classe em um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>evento para criar painéis desenhos personalizados em seu aplicativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class without specifying a background and foreground color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe sem especificar uma cor de primeiro plano e plano de fundo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para usar para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to render text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> usado para renderizar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the client area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do cliente a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do painel no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> values that represents state information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> valores que representa as informações de estado sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> that represents the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> que representa o painel para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class with a specified background and foreground color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe com uma cor de primeiro plano e plano de fundo especificada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para usar para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to render text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> usado para renderizar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the client area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do cliente a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do painel no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> values that represents state information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> valores que representa as informações de estado sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> that represents the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> que representa o painel para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> values that represents the foreground color of the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valores que representa a cor de primeiro plano do painel para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> values that represents the background color of the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valores que representa a cor de plano de fundo do painel para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The Panel property enables you to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de painel permite que você obtenha o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>que precisa ser desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use this information within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essas informações dentro do manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>evento de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle para executar tarefas de desenho em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> para desenhar.
